availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram B. Withers (Lyon County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, physician. Virginia native. Married to Mariah W. Cates Withers in Christian County, Kentucky, on January 4, 1818. Resident of Logan County, Kentucky, in 1840. Owned four enslaved persons in Logan County in 1840. Physician in Logan County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Logan County in 1850. Physician in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville, p. 225.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville, p. 64B.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 414A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film 000465562.
